QAPair.Question: What is (are) Leukemia - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations provide information on the different types of leukemia: American Cancer Society -- www.cancer.org/cancer/leukemia.html , Cancer Care -- www.cancercare.org/ , Leukemia Research Foundation -- leukemiarf.org/leukemia/ , National Cancer Institute -- www.cancer.gov/types/leukemia , The Leukemia and Lymphoma Society -- www.lls.org/ , US National Library of Medicine, MedlinePlus -- medlineplus.gov/leukemia.html ,
